forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Heavy snow with gusty winds this afternoon. High 3C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulation of 30cm or more. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.
forecastday.fcttext: Heavy snow with gusty winds this afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulation of a foot or more. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow. Winds will be gusty at times this evening. Thunder possible. Low -6C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulation of 30cm or more.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow. Winds will be gusty at times this evening. Thunder possible. Low 23F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 8 to 12 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to lingering snow showers during the afternoon. Thunder possible. High -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will transition to snow showers during the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 33F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low -14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 9F. Winds light and variable.
